title: SYMHC Classics: Maria Montessori
itunes:title: SYMHC Classics: Maria Montessori
description:
This 2017 episode covers Maria Montessori, who worked in several fields, though is mostly associated with education. Her theories on early education still shape the way kids learn today around the globe.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
